channel.title: Comments on: 5 iPhone Apps to Keep Business Running as Usual
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: I understand that. That is one of the reasons that I still love my Palm Pre: hardware keyboard. Have you tried the official <a href="http://ios.wordpress.org"/ title="WordPress for iOS" rel="nofollow">iOS WordPress app</a> yet?
item.content:encoded: I understand that. That is one of the reasons that I still love my Palm Pre: hardware keyboard. Have you tried the official iOS WordPress app yet?

item.title: By: Chrissy Begemann
item.dc:creator: Chrissy Begemann
item.description: I'm still on the lookout for a good WordPress app. I am new enough to the iPhone that typing on it is still a major pain, so I rely heavily on my computer when it is time for website updates and posting new articles.
item.content:encoded: I’m still on the lookout for a good WordPress app. I am new enough to the iPhone that typing on it is still a major pain, so I rely heavily on my computer when it is time for website updates and posting new articles.

item.title: By: Ray Hollister
item.dc:creator: Ray Hollister
item.description: Do you have a good WordPress app for iOS? I use <a href="http://developer.palm.com/appredirect/?packageid=net.nizzoli.poster" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Poster for Wordpress</a> on my Palm Pre, but I am looking at getting to get an iPod touch.
item.content:encoded: Do you have a good WordPress app for iOS? I use Poster for WordPress on my Palm Pre, but I am looking at getting to get an iPod touch.
